sink

Class ElasticSinkTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.kafka.connect.sink.SinkTask
      • sink.ElasticSinkTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.kafka.connect.connector.Task

    public class ElasticSinkTask
extends org.apache.kafka.connect.sink.SinkTask
    ElasticSinkTask is a Task that receives raw and preprocessed netflow data in csv format, converts them to json format and stores them to Elastic.
    Since:
    0.1-SNAPSHOT
    Version:
    0.1-SNAPSHOT
    Author:
    Space Hellas S.A.

    • Field Detail

      • csvRecordSchemaRaw

        CsvRecordSchema csvRecordSchemaRaw
        An object responsible for storing information about the columns in csv schema (raw netflow schema) (name, description, type). It also parses a csv records, convertes the fields that required convertions a returns a Hashmap with key the csv column name and value its value.

      • csvRecordSchemaPreprocessed

        CsvRecordSchema csvRecordSchemaPreprocessed
        An object responsible for storing information about the columns in csv schema (preprocessed netflow schema) (name, description, type). It also parses a csv records, convertes the fields that required convertions a returns a Hashmap with key the csv column name and value its value.

      • elasticJsonObjectRaw

        ElasticJsonObject elasticJsonObjectRaw
        An object keeping information about the JSON schema (raw netflow records), that will be used for storing records in Elastic. It loads a JSON file, which has information about the mapping between the input csv schema and the output JSON schema for Elastic. It converts a csv record to an Elastic object with the proper schema. It also contains some helper functions.

      • elasticJsonObjectPreprocessed

        ElasticJsonObject elasticJsonObjectPreprocessed
        An object keeping information about the JSON schema (preprocessed netflow records), that will be used for storing records in Elastic. It loads a JSON file, which has information about the mapping between the input csv schema and the output JSON schema for Elastic. It converts a csv record to an Elastic object with the proper schema. It also contains some helper functions.

      • logger

        private org.apache.log4j.Logger logger
        Logger Instance.

      • elasticFunctions

        private ElasticUtils elasticFunctions
        Object, that initializes connection with Elastic and does operations.

      • KAFKA_TOPICS

        private java.lang.String[] KAFKA_TOPICS
        String Kafka topics, where records will be collected from.

      • config

        private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> config
        HashMap(String, String) A hashmap contains all props passed in start() function.

      • SINK_RAW_NETFLOW

        private boolean SINK_RAW_NETFLOW
        A boolean variable, which defines if the raw incoming netflows, will be also inserted to Elastic. Default: False

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> props)
        Start function of sink task. It creates an Elastic functions object, load some required mapping files for conversion.
        Specified by:
        start in interface org.apache.kafka.connect.connector.Task
        Specified by:
        start in class org.apache.kafka.connect.sink.SinkTask
        Parameters:
        props - Map containing configuration properties.

      • put

        public void put(java.util.Collection<org.apache.kafka.connect.sink.SinkRecord> sinkRecords)
        Main task of sink connectors. Retrieves data from Kafka topics, converts them from csv format to json format using mapping files and stores them to appropriate Elastic index.
        Specified by:
        put in class org.apache.kafka.connect.sink.SinkTask
        Parameters:
        sinkRecords - Collection(SinkRecord) A Java collection, that contains all retrieved records from Kafka topics.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stop sink task. Closes Elastic connection.
        Specified by:
        stop in interface org.apache.kafka.connect.connector.Task
        Specified by:

        Returns version.
